# onetime

> Listen very carefully. I shall say this only once.

Michelle Dubois, *'Allo 'Allo*


`onetime` provides convenience functions to run R code only once per user. For
example, you can show a startup message only the first time (ever) that a
package is loaded.

For more information, see the [website](https://hughjonesd.github.io/onetime/).

```{r, child = "example.Rmd"} 
```

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hughjonesd/onetime")
```
